properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Tipton, TN; Mississippi, AR
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 9 at 11:44AM CST until January 17 at 5:30PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The Flood Advisory continues for portions of the Mississippi River...
Mississippi River at Tiptonville affecting New Madrid...Pemiscot
and Lake Counties
Mississippi River at Osceola affecting Mississippi...Lauderdale
and Tipton Counties
Mississippi River at Tunica Riverpark affecting Lee and Tunica
Counties

The Flood Advisory continues for
the Mississippi River at Osceola
* until Friday January 17.
* At 11 AM Thursday the stage was 27.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 28.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will remain steady over the next few days.
* At 27.0 feet...In Arkansas, high water interferes with grain barge
loading at the terminal at Osceola. Backwater is touching most of
the levee just north of Osceola on north past Mississippi County
Arkansas Road 330 in the Barfield Point vicinity. Mississippi
County Arkansas Road 430 is flooded across from Tellier Island. In
Tennessee, Crutcher Lake Road is flooded north of Cold Creek. The
Mississippi River is over its banks northeast of Open Lake.
Backwater has reached Bee Lake.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued Friday or sooner if conditions
warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
